issues.title: {{PROJECT_NAME}} Initial Setup
issues.description: Complete Go project setup with module, testing, and linting.

issues.title: Initialize Go module
issues.description:
Set up Go module:
- Verify go.mod has correct module path
- Run `go mod tidy`
- Verify Go version >= 1.21
- Test that `go build ./...` works

issues.title: Create Go project structure
issues.description:
Create standard Go layout:
- cmd/{{PROJECT_SLUG}}/main.go (entry point)
- internal/ (private packages)
- pkg/ (public packages, if needed)
- Verify imports work correctly

issues.title: Configure Go testing
issues.description:
Set up testing:
- Create first test file (*_test.go)
- Run `go test ./...` and confirm it passes
- Configure coverage: `go test -coverprofile=coverage.out ./...`
- Add Makefile targets for testing

issues.title: Configure golangci-lint
issues.description:
Set up linting:
- Install golangci-lint
- Create .golangci.yml configuration
- Run `golangci-lint run` and fix issues
- Add lint target to Makefile

issues.title: Configure GitHub Actions CI
issues.description:
Set up continuous integration:
- Create .github/workflows/ci.yml
- Run build, test, and lint on push/PR
- Test on Go 1.21, 1.22
- Add status badge to README

issues.title: Implement first working feature
issues.description:
Build the first functional feature:
- Implement core functionality in internal/ or pkg/
- Wire up in cmd/{{PROJECT_SLUG}}/main.go
- Write tests for the feature
- Ensure build and tests pass
